name: textweb
description: Text-grid web browser for AI agents. Renders pages as structured text with interactive element references instead of screenshots.

function.name: textweb_navigate
function.description: Navigate to a URL and render the page as a structured text grid. Interactive elements are annotated with [ref] numbers. Returns the text view (~2-5KB) instead of a screenshot (~1MB). No vision model needed.

function.name: textweb_click
function.description: Click an interactive element identified by its [ref] number from the text grid.

function.name: textweb_type
function.description: Type text into an input field identified by its [ref] number. Replaces existing content.

ref.description: Element reference number of the input field

text.description: Text to enter into the field

function.name: textweb_select
function.description: Select an option from a dropdown by its [ref] number.

ref.description: Element reference number of the dropdown

value.description: Option value or visible text to select

function.name: textweb_scroll
function.description: Scroll the current page. Returns the updated text grid.

function.name: textweb_snapshot
function.description: Re-render the current page without navigating. Use after waiting for dynamic content.

function.name: textweb_press
function.description: Press a keyboard key (Enter, Tab, Escape, ArrowDown, etc.).

function.name: textweb_upload
function.description: Upload a file to a file input element.

ref.description: Element reference number of the file input
